title: How do I get the clock off my lock screen to make it all black on my Pixel 4
content: I've tried everything to make my lock screen black.  I cant seem to get the clock off.  I have dimmed it, but it still keeps me up at night.  My Pixel 2 and 3 had no issues with this option.   I am not sure why the clock needs to show on your lock screen.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
